attributes.title: Garbage 🤩
attributes.review: This app is terrible and full of bugs. It crashed several times. Also the picture of the man when you first open the app makes my eyes burn.

attributes.title: Crashes
attributes.review: Every single time I open the app, it crashes. I wanted updates on the civil unrest that’s been going on but can’t get anywhere in the app without it crashing. SAD!

yeah you already know i’m part of the gen z thing whoop dee doo. i got on the app for a solid 20 seconds and just didn’t wanna look at it anymore. i mean yeah the layouts kinda dope but i just don’t like trump. maybe because i’m gen z or just because i have common sense so haha. if you want the app then go ahead and get it. i mean with how 2020 is going we’ll already probably die of corona or murder hornets or maybe a parallel universe. so have fun idiots. ❤️✨

attributes.title: The worst app to ever exist
attributes.review: This app took up so much space on my phone that I had to pay for so much extra storage that I went completely bankrupt. I will never support Trump or a Republican again.

attributes.title: This app is scary. F trump
attributes.review: Right when I opened the app I saw a fat ompa loo paper staring at me and telling me to vote. The dude wants to delete the best app in the world and I’m crying. Does he just want to take away dreams. People start careers on the app but he just wants to take it away.

attributes.title: Manny 2020
attributes.review: well butter my biscuits this app took too dang long to, how do you say, download, but pardon me how am i supposed to know what out little orange cheeto of a leader is up to? this app is #no bueno and is a waste of time so i wouldn’t bother getting it at all

attributes.title: THIS APP CALLED ME FAT
attributes.review: Honestly it’s even a disappointment that Apple has this app on their App Store because I was so insulted by this app smh. We’re in the Facism Unit in our history class and so I downloaded this app to learn more about it. I learned a lot about it BUT IN THE PROCESS IT CALLED ME FAT.

As soon as I opened this app, which took 3 months to download by the way (ridiculous!), I saw this scary scary man with baby bands replacing his actual hands!!! Absolutely terrified me! I felt like it was some sort of evil prank😖Mister! You have lost my vote!:(👎👎👎👎👎👎

attributes.title: you tried 💘🧚‍♀️✨😍 now don’t try again 😳
attributes.review: this app tried to convince me to eat my own hand. not sure since when that’s been part of the maga campaign, but it was very distressing and i would not recommend. also, the app as riddled with false advertising such as “keep america great,” which considering the 5,000+ missing indigenous women in this country, i would not consider to be an accurate statement.

attributes.title: No ❤️
attributes.review: I read a review that said I would receive a cardboard cutout of Harry Styles, a week later and it hasn’t arrived! The creators of this app need to fix their shipping issues asap!!! This was the last straw Donald, you lost my vote 😾.
